bibl.title: The Lions of Qasr Ibrim.
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Fragments of woolen textile that were part of a large cache of discarded materials which are believed to have been ransacked from the tombs of bishops. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Nettie K. Adams, The Lions of Qasr Ibrim.
A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 661-664, 1 fig.
Fragments of woolen textile that were part of a large cache of discarded materials which are believed to have been ransacked from the tombs of bishops. - Avec résumé en anglais.
